repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

physdesc.extent: 3 record cartons, 1 document box, and 1 oversize box

did.abstract: This collection contains the records of the Tufts Community Union (TCU) Senate, the student undergraduate legislative/executive body.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into three series: TCU Senate records; 2020 accessions; and 2020-2021 records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records of the Tufts Community Union (TCU) Senate. Materials include agendas, meeting minutes, reports, publications, manuals, anonymous course evaluations, clippings, and a student survey. Records date from 1962-2021.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Established in 1968, the Tufts Community Union (TCU) Senate is the student parliament and legislative/executive body of TCU Student Government for the undergraduate students of the College of Liberal Arts and Jackson College and the College of Engineering. As of Spring 2000, it is charged with representing the needs and interests of the TCU before the faculty of the undergraduate colleges, the administration, and the Trustees of Tufts College. Through the Treasury, it oversees the use of the student activities fee and ensures that the needs and interests of the students are voiced.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tufts Community Union (TCU) Senate Records, 1962 -- 2021. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Records from the 2020-2021 academic year were processed by Jane Kelly in 2021. Materials were bagged using Bagger and copied to Box for access. Received order was maintained. A file-level inventory was created, and series and collection-level description were updated at the time of processing.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains anonymous course evaluations compiled for student use, as well as reports, manuals, and publications produced by the Tufts Community Union (TCU) Senate.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Material was maintained in received order.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This series was processed by Darcy Foster, Archives Assistant, in Spring 2019, under the supervision of Adrienne Pruitt, Collections Management Archivist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains records of Tufts Community Union (TCU) Senate. Included are log books, consisting of agendas, minutes, and supplementary materials for TCU meetings; records such as publications, manuals, and project forms; project books consisting of project reports; State of the Senate reports; newspaper clippings; and a student survey. Materials date from 1962 to 2015, with the bulk of materials dating from 1981-2015.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the TCU Senate, 2012-2019, accession UA-2020-029.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This was processed by Diana Hernandez, Archives Assistant, in January 2020, under the supervision of Adrienne Pruitt, Collections Management Archivist. Materials were removed from oversize binders and placed in archival folders and boxes. Materials within binders were maintained in original order. Binders were organized chronologically.

did.unittitle: Faculty of Arts and Sciences FY budget

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by Iyra Chandra, 2021, accession UA-2022-018.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged in the order in which it was received.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This material was shared with Digital Collections and Archives using Google Drive. Materials were bagged using Bagger and copied to Box for access. One empty directory titled "Services" was deleted. Received order was maintained. A file-level inventory was created, and series and collection-level description were updated at the time of processing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains TCU Senate records from the 2020/2021 academic year. Records include those created by the Administration and Policy Committee, the Education Committee, the Executive Board, the TCU President, and the Treasury. These records include resolutions, emails to Tufts administrators, reports, fliers, and budgets. The material in this series addresses student medical leave policies, the COVID-19 pandemic, course and exam scheduling, rising costs of attendance, world civilization course requirements, demilitarizing the Tufts University Police Department, academic equity, Greek life, fossil fuel divestment, and other ongoing Senate projects.

did.unittitle: TCU Senate President's summer weekly COVID updates
